page.description: Change meta data (e.g. status, person) for an form instance specified by a formInstanceId.

argument.name: formInstanceId
argument.description: formInstanceId of the form instance whose meta data should be changed

argument.name: status
argument.description: updated form status - if blank, then the status is not changed

argument.name: person
argument.description: person to whom form is assigned - if blank, the person is not changed

return.name: result
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

property.name: rowsUpdated
property.description: number of rows in the forms table that were updated
